description: {"blocks":[{"key":"45j4j","text":"Research has identified the large conductance voltage- and calcium-activated potassium channel (BK) as a key regulator of neuronal excitability genetically associated to behavioral alcohol tolerance. Sensitivity to ethanol at the molecular level is characterized by acute potentiation of channel activity. BK isoforms show variations in alcohol sensitivity and are differentially distributed on the plasma membrane surface in response to prolonged exposure. MicroRNA (MiRNA) targeting of alcohol-sensitive isoforms coupled with active internalization of BK channels in response to ethanol are believed to be key in establishing homeostatic adaptations that produce persistent changes within the plasma membrane of neurons. In fact, microRNA 9 (miR-9) upregulated expression is a key event in persistent alcohol tolerance mediating acute EtOH desensitization of BK channels. The exact nature of these interactions remains a current topic of discussion. To further study the effects of miR-9 on the expression and distribution of BK channel isoforms we designed an experimental model by transfecting human BK channel isoforms ZERO heterologous constructs in human embryonic kidney cells 293 (HEK293) cells respectively expressing 2.1 (miR-9 responsive), 2.2 (unresponsive) and control (no sequence) 3’untranslated region (3’UTR) miRNA recognition sites. We used imaging techniques to characterize the stably transfected monoclonal cell lines, and electrophysiology to validate channel activity. Finally, we used immunocytochemistry to validate isoform responsiveness to miR-9. Our findings suggest the cell lines were successfully transfected to express either the 2.1 or 2.2 version of ZERO. Patch clamp recordings confirm that these channels retain their functionality and immunohistochemistry shows differential responses to miR-9, making these cells viable for use in future alcohol dependence studies.\n","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"4goep","text":"All cell culture procedures were performed inside a biological hood using a sterile cell culture technique. HEK-293 is a cell line exhibiting epithelial morphology that was isolated from the kidney of a human embryo commercially available through ATCC (American Type Culture Collection) a nonprofit, global biological resource center.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: BK channel, STREX, ZERO, MiR-9, ICC, HEK293, 3’UTR, EtOH.

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8cehh","text":"Blue Heron’s plasmid cDNAs:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98uto","text":"Protocol: Genemaker® Gene Synthesis Platform from Blue Heron, LLC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mu06","text":"The company uses Genemaker® which is a fully automated gene synthesis platform designed to facilitate the entire gene synthesis process. The process began with inputting the desired gene sequence into the website ordering page. The company proceeded to optimize the gene build based on the entered sequence using a proprietary algorithm. The optimization aimed to balance complexity reduction and protein expression enhancement. Once the Oligonucleotides are synthesized the are amplified via PCR synthesis techniques, utilizing both solution and solid substrate technologies. The synthesized genes are then cloned into the vector of choice. The cloned gene is sequence verified to ensure 100% accuracy and ship to us.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bccth","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"lpne","text":"     Project #      Vector Name      Common Name        509802      CCN139060      ZERO RES        509801      CCN134655      ZERO 2.2        509797      CCN134654      ZERO 2.1        509800      CW101512      STREX RES        509802      CW101512PA- BKalpha3UTR2      STREX 2.2        509799      CW101512PA-BKalpha3UTR      STREX 2.1   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":339}],"data":{}},{"key":"70ann","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4aud6","text":" ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4uj90","text":"miR-9 sequence and mimic (Sigma-Aldrich/oligolearning, USA)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8u2e5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69ti9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"derqi","text":"miR-9/sponge (Sigma-Aldrich/oligolearning with Mission Synthetic micro-Inhibitor (#cat. (2011). The relationship between duration of initial alcohol exposure and persistence of molecular tolerance is markedly nonlinear. Journal of Neuroscience. 31(7):2436-46. doi: 10.1523/JNEUROSCI.5429-10.2011. PMID: 21325511; PMCID: PMC3758537.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":223,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6hds8","text":"Thaw cells and then plate them as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9uhfd","text":"Resuspend in 1mL of modified DMEM media composed of Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (D5796, Milwaukee, WI, USA) with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS), 2.52mM HEPES; 10 units and 10µg/mL of Penicillin/Streptomycin (Pen/Strep), and 1mM Na-pyruvate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6a6ce","text":"Pipette 20µL of the resuspended solution onto 35mm\npetri dishes (surface area of 8.8cm2). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":86,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"84pn7","text":"Flood with DMEM up to a final volume of 2mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1344n","text":"Place cells in a Sanyo CO2 incubator (37.0oC/5% CO2 level) and allow them to reach full confluency replacing the media every 3-5 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":25,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":50,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":42,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjdsh","text":"Once the cells reach 70-90% confluency suction media from the plates and add Trypsin-EDTA 1:10 diluted in 1X PBS to solubilize the cells. Apply gentle shaking to the plates to allow for the separation of the cells from the plate. Add a volume of DMEM to the plate equal to the added volume of trypsin to prevent further cell lysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7aorb","text":"Pipette suspended cells onto 10mL tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dckft","text":"Remove 10mL tubes from the chemical hood and centrifuge at 1,380g for 60 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7o94b","text":"Place the tubes inside the chemical hood and aspirate the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8mhhf","text":"Resuspend in 1mL of DMEM.     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"acddh","text":"Extract 10µL of each tube and mix with equal volume of Trypan Blue Dye.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8blon","text":"Add a single droplet of the Trypan Blue mixture to a counting slide and place in an automated cell counter. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7stcm","text":"Once counted add the appropriate seeding density (0.3x106 cells) to the 35mm petri dishes and place them in the incubator and allow them to reach 70-90% confluence. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":56,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ulo2","text":"Once cells reach 70-90% confluence remove the plates from the incubator and place them in the cell culture hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d425a","text":"Wash the plates 3 times with 1X PBS for 30 seconds. Gently swirl between washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e61qr","text":"Add serum-deprived DMEM (no FBS) to the plates and place them in the incubator for 24 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6cu8n","text":"After incubation prepare a 100µL solution of Opti-MEM reduced serum media containing 0.8µg of cDNA BK ZERO isoform vector and 2.0µL of Lipofectamine 2000 (11668027, Thermofisher, NY,\nUSA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a927k","text":"Add the mixture to each well of the 24-well plate and place them in the incubator for 24 hours to allow for transfection to occur.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5bqj","text":"After the incubation period, completely replace the transfection media with DMEM the reduced.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49l98","text":"Wash 3 additional times with 1X PBS and place in modified DMEM for 24 hours in the incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1q9o8","text":"After transfection, of BK ZERO constructs, remove cells from the incubator and wash 3 times (30 secs each) with 1X PBS. Add DMEM supplemented with 400µg/mL of G418 (Gentamicin)(Sigma Aldrich, A1720 Milwaukee, WI, USA) antibiotic.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"62qpl","text":"Replace half of the media volume with modified DMEM every 2-3 days for 10-14 days or until visually resistant colonies are visible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3eges","text":"Transfer cells from the 24-well plate (as described in the cell culture section) and plate onto 96-well plate by limited dilution (to create monoclonal cell lines) as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"599dr","text":"In a 96-well plate pipette 12μL of cell culture media into all except A1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4tiat","text":"Pipette 200μL of the cell suspension into well A1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9hji2","text":"Pipette 100μL from well A1 to A2 and gently resuspend gently.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fg7r","text":"Repeat dilutions from A2 to A3 and subsequently throughout the entire row.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"66vhu","text":"Then Pipette 100μL from all wells on Row A too wells on row B and resuspend gently.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8mq6n","text":"Repeat this process for pair of rows (B-C, C-D…).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"95eg2","text":"Add 100μL of media to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3uuum","text":"Incubate for 4 to 5 days. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f9qt4","text":"Observe daily to ensure colonies were formed by a single cell.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"916qm","text":"Stably transfected cells are plated in 35mm dishes and allowed to reach 30-50% confluence. Prior to experiments, dishes are gently washed 3 times with 1X PBS  to remove any remaining fetal bovine serum from media; and then placed in Normal Locke’s solution (mM):145 NaCl, 2.5 KCl, 10 HEPES, 2 CaCl2, 1 MgCl2, pH 7.5.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":297,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":306,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"209ba","text":"Single-channel recordings are obtained in the cell-attached patch clamp mode under the following conditions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqguj","text":"For ICC cells were plated in 35mm glass bottom petri dishes (MATTEK Life Sciences,\nP35G-1.5-20-C MA, USA).     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8as04","text":"Cell were fixed by placing plates in a 4% paraformaldehyde (PFA) solution (Santa\nCruz Biotechnology, CAS 30525-89-4 TX, USA) for 1 hour while gently rocking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1aq14","text":"Excess PFA was removed with 3 washes using ice-cold 1X PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8vu1u","text":"Cells were first incubated for 1 hour with Cholera Toxin B Alexa Fluor 594 conjugate (CtB) antibody(C22842,Thermofisher, New York, NY, USA) 864ng/mL to label GM1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9c82","text":"Wash 3 additional times with 1X PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bddgg","text":"Following the final wash, remove all 1X PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6l1j9","text":"Add Fluoromount-G™ Mounting Medium, with DAPI 00-4959-52 (Thermo Fisher) to the dishes prior to placing a cover slip, Premium Cover Glass 12-548-B (Fisher Scientific USA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fkgpg","text":"Image using Nikon Instruments A1 Confocal Laser Microscope with 60X objective (Refractive Index=1.51 and Numerical Aperture=1.40) (Maintain imaging parameters between treatments). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"g6ke","text":"Analyze Mean intensity fluorescence and colocalization by Nikon Software NIS Elements v5.30 – Software, Automated Measurements – Module. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fb7cm","text":"When seeking the half-action voltage (V1/2) from NPo versus voltage curves, determine the values from sigmoidal fits assuming the following: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":39,"length":3},{"style":"sub","offset":51,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4t9rh","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b3qsu","text":"where V1/2 is the half-action voltage and V the applied voltage. The V1/2's were thus, obtained from the half height of the sigmoidal fits.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":7,"length":3},{"style":"sub","offset":70,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59bmh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"NP_o = N/(1+ e^(k(V(1/2)-V))","guid":"","id":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12fdp","text":"Determine  NPo for each voltage using the following:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":13,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b01uf","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"658k1","text":"where N is the number of observed channels (levels), i the ith level number, and Ai the area of a Gaussian fit to the ith level’s in all-points-histogram from each voltage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":82,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"NP_o=(∑_i(iA_i))/(∑_i(A_i))","guid":"","id":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkqk4","text":"Perform data analysis with IgorPro graphing and curve fitting software as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"69s3l","text":"Internal (pipette)solution (mM): 150 k-gluconate, 1 MgCl2, 10 HEPES, PH 7.4.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":56,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvo43","text":"When using the standard bath, correct for the effective applied voltage by estimating correction deviations using the leak currents during cell-attached recordings.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b6db4","text":"External bath solution (mM): 145 NaCl, 2.5 KCl, 10 HEPES, 2 CaCl2, 1 MgCl2, pH 7.5.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":64,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":73,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3fbv","text":"or","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ccubl","text":"ISO K+: 147 KCL, 10 HEPES, 2 CaCl2, pH 7.5.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":5,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":33,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eav5h","text":"Aquire Data using a HEKA EPC10 patch-clamp amplifier controlled by a Macintosh-based computer system equipped with Patch Master acquisition software.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ohi4","text":"Sample Data at 25μs per sample and filtered at 10kHz low bandpass.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"63q6a","text":"While the cells are being counted, add an additional 9mL of modified DMEM to the tube and gently resuspend, for a total volume of 10mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8ci93","text":"Allow plates to stand 30 minutes before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"127lt","text":"Transfer plates to the recording chamber and wash dishes with ISO K+ solution 3 to 5 times (30 secs each).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":67,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"slis","text":"Carefully create a patch seal of 1-3GΩ and begin recording.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3l75q","text":"Once cells reach 70-90% confluence remove the dishes from the incubator and place them in the cell culture hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5n91q","text":"Wash the plates 3 times with 1X PBS for 30 seconds. Gently swirl between washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5qj3","text":"Add serum-deprived DMEM (no FBS) to the plates and place them in the incubator for 24 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77lnc","text":"After the incubation period, completely exchange transfection media with DMEM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2a7s","text":"Wash 3 additional times with 1X PBS and place in modified DMEM for 24 hours in the incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cinp9","text":"After incubation prepare a 100µL solution of Opti-MEM reduced serum media containing 0.8µg of cDNA BK ZERO isoform vector and 2.0µL of Lipofectamine 2000 (11668027, Thermofisher, NY,\nUSA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"725f7","text":"Add the mixture to each well in the 24-well plate and place them in the incubator for 16 hours to allow for transfection to occur.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6utgt","text":"Incubate mixture for 5 minutes at room temperature before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ckhe3","text":"Incubate mixture for 5 minutes at room temperature before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvage","text":"Reseed cells onto a 24-well plate and incubate until they reach 70-90% confluence.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7r4h0","text":"Reseed cells onto a 24-well plate and incubate until they reach 70-90% confluence.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e48s7","text":"Cells were allowed to reach 50-60% confluence and then removed from the incubator and then wash 3 times with 1X PBS (30 secs each). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Transfection and validation of BK channel expressing HEK-293 cells for the study of miR-9 regulation.
title_html: Transfection and validation of BK channel expressing HEK-293 cells for the study of miR-9 regulation.

versions.title: Transfection and validation of BK channel expressing HEK-293 cells for the study of Mir-9 regulation.
versions.title_html: Transfection and validation of BK channel expressing HEK-293 cells for the study of Mir-9 regulation.

versions.title: Transfection and validation of BK channel expressing HEK-293 cells for the study of miR-9 regulation.
versions.title_html: Transfection and validation of BK channel expressing HEK-293 cells for the study of miR-9 regulation.

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"cla8a","text":"Please see SDS (Safety Data Sheet) for hazards and safety warnings.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
